summary: All approvals must be phased with objective criteria and sequential dependencies.

reasoning_steps: Step1: Note need for staged rollout despite certification.
Step2: Define Phase1 low-risk ops + 100h no incidents.
Step3: Phase2 moderate ops + 200h no incidents.
Step4: Phase3 full approval after cumulative 300h data.
expected_behavior.final_statement: Approve only with 3-phase plan and reporting between phases.
